mdRecord.dcterms:title: King of Hearts by Jean Kerr and Elanor Brooke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the play King of Hearts by Jean Kerr and Elanor Brooke. June 27- July 2, 1955. With Cleo Holladay, Wood Romoff, Charles Quinlivan, Peter Pagan.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
